section.title:
cash receipts posting of
accounts receivable posting cash receipts for Post Cash Receipts
section.para: To post unposted Cash Receipts, select the "Post Cash Receipts" option. The following screen will appear:
When posting unposted Cash Receipts, you are presented with the following options:

varlistentry.term: cash receipts printing journal for Print Cash Receipts Journal

listitem.para: Select to print the Cash Receipts Journal.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without posting unposted Cash Receipts, returning you to the application desktop.
